name: Please Follow The Instructions
description:
After the child you are babysitting goes to bed, the house starts to come alive, tormenting you and trying to get you to succumb to the dark forces. Yet the only thing you can do, is follow the instructions given to you.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

E - Show Instructions, Immobilized 

1 / 2 - Turn Page Left/Right

Q - Show Phone

F - Flash Light

Left Click (Hold) - Interact (Hold object)

P - Pause
